content.name: diskGroup
content.description:
Disk groups classify the disks in the system into groups with equivalent storage characteristics. These characteristics include disk type, capacity, and rotational speed.

The system uses disk groups for creating pools.

attributes.name: tierType
attributes.description: Disk type.

attributes.name: disksPastEOL
attributes.description: The number of disks past EOL (end of life).

attributes.name: disksWithEOLLess30Days
attributes.description: The number of disks in disk group with EOL (end of life) less than 30 days.

attributes.name: disksWithEOLLess60Days
attributes.description: The number of disks in disk group with EOL (end of life) less than 60 days.

attributes.name: disksWithEOLLess90Days
attributes.description: The number of disks in disk group with EOL (end of life) less than 90 days.

attributes.name: disksWithEOLLess180Days
attributes.description: The number of disks in disk group with EOL (end of life) less than 180 days.

attributes.name: totalDisks
attributes.description: Total number of disks in the disk group.

attributes.name: minHotSpareCandidates
attributes.description: Minimum number of hot spares required for traditional pools for the disk group.  As a rule one Hot spare is required per 30 disks.

attributes.name: configuredFastCacheDisks
attributes.description: The number of configured disks used by FAST Cache.

attributes.name: advertisedSize
attributes.description: Capacity written on the label of the disks in the disk  group.

attributes.name: hotSparePolicyStatus
attributes.description: Status of the hot spare policy for the disk group.

attributes.name: isFASTCacheAllowable
attributes.description:
Indicates whether or not disks from this diskGroup are valid to use for FASTCache. Values are:
  • true - Disks may be used in FASTCache.
  • false - Disks may not be used in FASTCache.

attributes.name: configuredTraditionalPoolDisks
attributes.description: The number of configured disks used by traditional pools.

attributes.name: rpm
attributes.description: For non-Flash disks, the rotational speed in revolutions per minute (RPM).

attributes.name: unconfiguredDisks
attributes.description: The number of unconfigured disks in disk group. Determined by subtracting the number of disks in use by pools, FAST Cache and the number of disks reserved for pools that are in the process of being created or extended from the total number of disks. Hot spares are not included in the determination of this value.

attributes.name: speed
attributes.description: Interface speed of the disks in the disk group.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number of the disks.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Disk group name.

attributes.name: diskTechnology
attributes.description:
Disk technology of the disks in the disk group. There are two hard disk technologies: SAS and NL-SAS, and flash disk technologies are MLC (Multi-Level Cell) and TLC (Triple-Level Cell). MLC drives are referred to as SAS Flash 2 in this API and TLC are referred to as SAS Flash 3.
SAS hard disks have greater performance, throughput and less latency than NL-SAS disks.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the diskGroup instance.

attributes.name: diskSize
attributes.description: The capacity of each disk.
